verses.kjv: Forasmuch then as Christ hath suffered for us in the flesh, arm yourselves likewise with the same mind: for he that hath suffered in the flesh hath ceased from sin;
verses.ct: Since Christ suffered physically for us, prepare yourselves with that same attitude — because anyone who has suffered physically has broken free from sin.

verses.kjv: That he no longer should live the rest of his time in the flesh to the lusts of men, but to the will of God.
verses.ct: As a result, you no longer spend the rest of your earthly lives chasing human desires, but instead living according to God's will.

verses.kjv: For the time past of our life may suffice us to have wrought the will of the Gentiles, when we walked in lasciviousness, lusts, excess of wine, revellings, banquetings, and abominable idolatries:
verses.ct: You've already spent enough of your lives doing what the pagans choose to do — living in sexual immorality, evil desires, drunkenness, wild parties, drinking binges, and disgusting idol worship.

verses.kjv: Wherein they think it strange that ye run not with them to the same excess of riot, speaking evil of you:
verses.ct: Your old friends are shocked that you no longer join them in their reckless, out-of-control lifestyle, and they insult you for it.

verses.kjv: Who shall give account to him that is ready to judge the quick and the dead.
verses.ct: But they will have to answer to the one who stands ready to judge both the living and the dead.

verses.kjv: For for this cause was the gospel preached also to them that are dead, that they might be judged according to men in the flesh, but live according to God in the spirit.
verses.ct: This is why the good news was proclaimed even to those who have since died — so that even though they were judged in their physical bodies as all humans are, they might live in the spirit according to God.

verses.kjv: But the end of all things is at hand: be ye therefore sober, and watch unto prayer.
verses.ct: The end of everything is near. So be clear-headed and self-controlled, devoting yourselves to prayer.

verses.kjv: And above all things have fervent charity among yourselves: for charity shall cover the multitude of sins.
verses.ct: Most importantly, love each other deeply, because love covers over a huge number of sins.

verses.kjv: Use hospitality one to another without grudging.
verses.ct: Welcome each other into your homes without complaining about it.

verses.kjv: As every man hath received the gift, even so minister the same one to another, as good stewards of the manifold grace of God.
verses.ct: Each of you has received a gift, so use it to serve one another as faithful managers of God's rich and varied grace.

verses.kjv: If any man speak, let him speak as the oracles of God; if any man minister, let him do it as of the ability which God giveth: that God in all things may be glorified through Jesus Christ, to whom be praise and dominion for ever and ever. Amen.
verses.ct: If someone speaks, they should speak as though delivering God's own words. If someone serves, they should serve with the strength God provides — so that in everything, God receives glory through Jesus Christ. All praise and power belong to him forever and ever. Amen.

verses.kjv: Beloved, think it not strange concerning the fiery trial which is to try you, as though some strange thing happened unto you:
verses.ct: Dear friends, don't be surprised by the painful trials you're going through, as if something unusual were happening to you.

verses.kjv: But rejoice, inasmuch as ye are partakers of Christ’s sufferings; that, when his glory shall be revealed, ye may be glad also with exceeding joy.
verses.ct: Instead, be glad that you are sharing in Christ's sufferings, so that when his glory is revealed, you will overflow with an incredible joy.

verses.kjv: If ye be reproached for the name of Christ, happy are ye; for the spirit of glory and of God resteth upon you: on their part he is evil spoken of, but on your part he is glorified.
verses.ct: If people insult you because of the name of Christ, you are blessed, because the Spirit of glory — the Spirit of God — rests on you. They dishonor him, but you bring him glory.

verses.kjv: But let none of you suffer as a murderer, or as a thief, or as an evildoer, or as a busybody in other men’s matters.
verses.ct: Make sure that none of you suffers as a murderer, a thief, a criminal, or someone who meddles in other people's business.

verses.kjv: Yet if any man suffer as a Christian, let him not be ashamed; but let him glorify God on this behalf.
verses.ct: But if you suffer because you are a Christian, don't be ashamed. Instead, praise God that you carry that name.

verses.kjv: For the time is come that judgment must begin at the house of God: and if it first begin at us, what shall the end be of them that obey not the gospel of God?
verses.ct: The time has come for judgment to start with God's own household. And if it starts with us, what will be the outcome for those who refuse to obey God's good news?

verses.kjv: And if the righteous scarcely be saved, where shall the ungodly and the sinner appear?
verses.ct: If it's hard enough for the righteous to be saved, what will happen to the ungodly and the sinful?

verses.kjv: Wherefore let them that suffer according to the will of God commit the keeping of their souls to him in well doing, as unto a faithful Creator.
verses.ct: So those who suffer according to God's will should entrust their souls to their faithful Creator and continue doing what is right.
